response_time.Description: Response time column not use for this data

sample.Description: Event sample starting at 0 (Matlab convention starting at 1)

Levels.play: button press in middle of screen

trial_type.Description: Upper hierarchy for events in the experiment. Type of event (different from EEGLAB convention)

Levels.rest_sit: start 1 minute of rest EEG sitting
Levels.rest_stand: start 1 minute of rest EEG standing
Levels.start_sound1_sit: start of narrative 1 in sitting condition
Levels.start_sound1_walk: start of narrative 1 in walking condition
Levels.stop_sound1_sit: stop of narrative 1 in sitting condition
Levels.stop_sound1_walk: stop of narrative 1 in walking condition
Levels.start_sound2_sit: start of narrative 2 in sitting condition
Levels.start_sound2_walk: start of narrative 2 in walking condition
Levels.stop_sound2_sit: stop of narrative 2 in sitting condition
Levels.stop_sound2_walk: stop of narrative 2 in walking condition
Levels.start_sound3_sit: start of narrative 3 in sitting condition
Levels.start_sound3_walk: start of narrative 3 in walking condition
Levels.stop_sound3_sit: stop of narrative 3 in sitting condition
Levels.stop_sound3_walk: stop of narrative 3 in walking condition
Levels.start_sound4_sit: start of narrative 4 in sitting condition
Levels.start_sound4_walk: start of narrative 4 in walking condition
Levels.stop_sound4_sit: stop of narrative 4 in sitting condition
Levels.stop_sound4_walk: stop of narrative 4 in walking condition
Levels.start_sound5_sit: start of narrative 5 in sitting condition
Levels.start_sound5_walk: start of narrative 5 in walking condition
Levels.stop_sound5_sit: stop of narrative 5 in sitting condition
Levels.stop_sound5_walk: stop of narrative 5 in walking condition
Levels.start_sound6_sit: start of narrative 6 in sitting condition
Levels.start_sound6_walk: start of narrative 6 in walking condition
Levels.stop_sound6_sit: stop of narrative 6 in sitting condition
Levels.stop_sound6_walk: stop of narrative 6 in walking condition
